description: Indicates whether the specified Amazon Web Services resources are compliant. If a resource is noncompliant, this operation returns the number of Config rules that the resource does not comply with. A resource is compliant if it complies with all the Config rules that evaluate it. It is noncompliant if it does not comply with one or more of these rules. If Config has no current evaluation results for the resource, it returns INSUFFICIENT_DATA. This result might indicate one of the following conditions about the rules that evaluate the resource:

nested_items.name: ComplianceByResources
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the specified Amazon Web Services resource complies with all of the Config rules that evaluate it.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Web Services resource that was evaluated.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services resource that was evaluated.

nested_items.name: Compliance
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Amazon Web Services resource complies with all of the Config rules that evaluated it.

nested_items.name: ComplianceType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an Amazon Web Services resource or Config rule is compliant.

nested_items.name: ComplianceContributorCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules that cause a result of NON_COMPLIANT, up to a maximum number.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string that you use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
